word_mean: 回弹的：变形后重新恢复其原形状、大小

sentence.Network_en: George Fraser was clearly a good soldier, calm and resilient.
sentence.Network_cn: 乔治·弗雷泽显然是个好士兵，沉着冷静且适应力强。

sentence.Network_en: Camels are among the most physiologically resilient creatures on Earth.
sentence.Network_cn: 骆驼是地球上生理适应能力最强的生物之一。

sentence.Network_en: He'll get over it—young people are amazingly resilient.
sentence.Network_cn: 他会克服这些的—年轻人的适应力惊人。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语单词的奥秘 - luozhong10的日志 - 网易博客 ... floppy（ 松软的，软盘）； resilient（ 有弹性的）； hilarious（ 欢乐的，欢跃的）…
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(R) -亿城英语 ... resiliency 跳回 resilient 弹回的 resiliometer 弹力计.
关于股票的一些英文 - 南方财富网 ... resilience…… 回弹，复原力 resilient …… 有回弹力的，恢复活力的 risk …… 保险项目.
弹性的(resilient):多样的(diverse)去中枢化和分散的(decentralized and distributed)多余的过剩的(redundant) 生命的运转原则(life.

list.abs: 石油词汇英语翻译(QR)--石油百科 ... resilient coupling 弹性连接 resilient material 弹性材料 resilient ring 弹性环.
resilient joint 弹性接合resilient support 弹性支座resin 尸
3. resilient responseresilient joint 弹性接合resilient seal valve 带弹性密封的阀
resilient rubbber cushion 弹性橡胶垫resilient seal 弹性密封resilient sealing system 弹性密封系统

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from Latin resilient- 'leaping back', from the verb resilire (see resile)

entry.tran: 坚韧的;有弹性的;有韧性的;有回弹力的
entry.def: Something that is resilient is strong and not easily damaged by being hit, stretched, or squeezed.

example.ex: Cotton is more resistant to being squashed and polyester is more resilient.
example.tran: 棉布更抗压，而涤纶更有弹性。

example.ex: ...an armchair of some resilient plastic material.
example.tran: 由某种弹性塑料做成的扶手椅

entry.tran: 能复原的;恢复快的;适应力强的
entry.def: People and things that are resilient are able to recover easily and quickly from unpleasant or damaging events.

example.ex: George Fraser was clearly a good soldier, calm and resilient...
example.tran: 乔治·弗雷泽显然是个好士兵，沉着冷静且适应力强。

example.ex: When the U.S. stock market collapsed in October 1987, the Japanese stock market was the most resilient.
example.tran: 1987年10月美国股市崩盘后，日本股市是反弹最快的。

means.word_mean: 1. recovering readily from adversity, depression, or the like

auth_sentence.content: People are resilient here, and used to earthquakes.
auth_sentence.res_content: People are resilient here, and used to earthquakes.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: People are resilient here, and used to earthquakes.

auth_sentence.content: We will be a very robust and resilient population.
auth_sentence.res_content: We will be a very robust and resilient population.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We will be a very robust and resilient population.

auth_sentence.content: But this is a very hardy and resilient people.
auth_sentence.res_content: But this is a very hardy and resilient people.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But this is a very hardy and resilient people.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 弹性的;能迅速[从不幸中]恢复活力的
stems_affixes.word_buile: re重新+sili=sali跳+ent……的→能重新跳起来→有弹性的
as一再+sail=sali跳→一再跳起来→攻击

means.word_mean: (指物体或材料)能复原的;有弹性的;有弹力的
(指人的性格)能迅速恢复或重新振作的;达观的;适应性强的

sentences.en: She has resilient character and will soon be cheerful again.
sentences.cn: 她有达观的性格, 不久便会振作起来。

sentences.en: The body of the camera makes it highly resilient to outdoor use.
sentences.cn: 这部照相机的机身很适合户外使用。
